entry.title: WIND WARNING , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:42 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 7:03 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:03 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 7:03 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
